Junior Engineer - Software Quality Assurance

Expires: 2025-10-31

Active
Intelligenes is currently looking for a ‘Junior Engineer - Software Quality Assurance’. The ideal candidate should possess the following: Job Description Participate in requirements review and understand new feature development. Assist in designing, implementation and execution of test cases for new and existing features. Collaborate with software engineering team on QA/Testing topics. Perform UI/UX testing to uncover flaws within the interface. Contribute to our quality projects, including automation of test cases, with a focus on feature deployment Actively participates in agile meetings with product management and development team Gather requirements, build testing solutions and troubleshoot issues in order to deliver high-quality projects & products. Communicate technical concepts/issues clearly to internal stakeholders Develops, documents and maintains test cases and validation reports. Learn how to automate Learn and develop QA best practices Identify and communicate risks Has knowledge of Azure DevOps Has basic idea of SQL queries Minimum Education: Bachelors (Computer Engineering, Software Engineering and Computer Science) Experience Required: Minimum 1.5 – 2 years of experience in the similar role. Employment Benefits: Market competitive salary package Hybrid Working Medical coverage OPD Allowance Travel Allowance Bi-Annual Increments Location: Karachi Apply Now:rohma.akram@intelligenes.net and mention position in subjectline Days & Hours: Mon–Fri, 12:00 PM–9:00 PM

HR Manager

Posted: 2025-10-17

Expires: 2025-10-31

Active
Job Title: HR Manager Location: Islamabad Job Type: Full-time Job Summary: The HR manager is responsible for overseeing recruitment, HR operations, and employee engagement to ensure a smooth and efficient HR function. This role involves developing and implementing HR strategies, managing the end-to-end recruitment process, streamlining HR operations, and fostering a positive workplace culture. Key Responsibilities: Develop and execute recruitment strategies to attract top talent. Manage the full recruitment cycle, including job postings, screening, interviewing, and onboarding. Partner with department heads to identify hiring needs and ensure timely placements. Oversee HR policies and procedures. Maintain employee records, contracts, and HR documentation. Ensure payroll processing, benefits administration, and attendance management. Handle grievance resolution, disciplinary actions, and conflict management. Monitor and improve HR systems and processes for efficiency. Develop and implement employee engagement programs to boost morale and productivity. Conduct employee satisfaction surveys and suggest improvements. Organize team-building activities, recognition programs, and wellness initiatives. Address employee concerns and maintain a positive work environment. Requirements: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field. 2+ years of HR experience. Strong background in recruitment, HR operations, and employee engagement. Experience in the IT or telecom industry preferred. Ability to handle multiple tasks and meet deadlines. Proficiency in HRIS (Human Resource Information Systems). Problem-solving and conflict-resolution abilities. Strategic thinking and decision-making skills. Apply: careers@econceptions.mobi
📍 Islamabad#HR Manager🧳 Experienced Required

Senior iOS Developer

Posted: 2025-10-17

Expires: 2025-10-31

Active
🚀 We’re Hiring: Senior iOS Developer (Onsite) 📍 Location: DHA Phase 1, Sector F, Islamabad 🕘 Timing: 9 AM to 6 PM (Monday to Friday) Are you passionate about building seamless, high-performing iOS applications? Join Global Financial Media, part of the National Technology Group, a market leader in financial portals and services across the Middle East with offices in Saudi Arabia, UAE, Egypt, Bahrain, Sri Lanka, and Pakistan. About the Role: We’re looking for a Senior iOS Developer to join our Islamabad team. In this role, you’ll work on both backend and frontend development, taking ownership of existing projects and contributing to the creation of a cutting-edge financial news & media portal. Key Responsibilities: Develop and integrate frontend and backend components for iOS applications. Take over and enhance existing backend content systems and web portals. Contribute to bi-weekly Agile product releases across multiple platforms. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality solutions. Build and maintain a modern financial news & media portal, including news categorization, company profiles, price feeds, and advertisements. Define functional and non-functional requirements for new software. Ensure top-tier software quality, security, scalability, and maintainability. Requirements: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, IT, or related field. Proven iOS development experience with Swift, Objective-C, and iOS frameworks. Strong backend integration skills. Familiarity with Agile (Scrum/Kanban) and release cycles. Strong understanding of security, scalability, and maintainability principles. Excellent communication and team collaboration skills. Good to Have: Experience in financial news or media applications. Familiarity with CMS or data feed integration. Knowledge of DevOps tools and CI/CD pipelines. 📩 How to Apply: Send your resume to Jobs@Globalfinancialmedia.Com with the subject line “Senior iOS Developer”.
📍 Islamabad#Senior iOS Developer🧳 Experienced Required
